Text: I don’t know what you look like, but if you have se with me your game:games will triple!

choice2.Value: Idk, I already have so much game…
choice2.Text: More can’t hurt. The real question is how much you can help with my SS.

choice1.Text: Sex score, a measure of how much sex?

choice1.Value: Was this game made by teenage boys?

choice2.Value: Tomorrow morning when you see the imprint I left in your bed you will realize just how much of a god you are.
